English: Subject's sentry gun will deal less damage.
Description: Describes the disadvantage of having a poor "Sentry damage" value.

French.Translation: La tourelle du sujet inflige moins de dégâts.

Italian.Translation: La torretta automatica del soggetto infliggerà danni minori.

German.Translation: Sentry-Geschütz der Versuchsperson verursacht weniger Schaden.

Spanish.Translation: La centinela del sujeto infligirá menos daño.

Portuguese_Brazil.Translation: A arma sentinela do indivíduo causa menos danos.

Polish.Translation: Działko wartownicze biorcy będzie zadawać mniejsze obrażenia.

Japanese.Translation: 対象のセントリーガンのダメージが下がる。

Korean.Translation: 대상의 센트리 건이 더 적은 대미지를 줍니다.

Chinese_Traditional.Translation: 實驗對象的自動砲台槍會造成較少傷害。

Chinese_Simplified.Translation: 使用者的哨戒炮造成的伤害减少。

name: BoosterImplants.Effects.SentryGunDamageDescriptionNegative
